Module scheduler
Package user

Class UserDAOImp

  • java.lang.Object
    • user.UserDAOImp
  • public class UserDAOImp
extends Object
    This is the DAO controller for Users. It sends SQL queries to the Database Statement controller and holds User information returned.
    Version:
    1.0, 01/22/21
    Author:
    Eric Westfall

      • getCurrentUserId

        public int getCurrentUserId()
        When the user logs in, the current user id is set and this function returns it.
        Returns:
        The id of the current user.

      • getUserKeys

        public Set getUserKeys()
        This method returns the set of all keys in the user map.
        Returns:
        The Set of User ids.

      • getUser

        public User getUser​(int key)
        Returns a user with the given user id from the HashMap.
        Parameters:
        key - The user id.
        Returns:
        The User to return.

      • setCurrentUserId

        Parameters:
